      Counts the total number of cards in the deck (mazo).

    • getMazo

      public Carta[][] getMazo()
      Returns the deck of cards (mazo) as a 2D array.
      Returns:
      A 2D array of Carta objects representing the deck of cards.

    • barajar

      public void barajar()
      Shuffles the deck of cards (mazo) by randomly rearranging the cards. This method creates a new shuffled deck and replaces the current deck with it.

    • siguiente

      public Carta siguiente()
      Retrieves the next card from the deck (mazo) and removes it from the deck.
      Returns:
      The next Carta object from the deck, or null if the deck is empty.

    • getBaraja

      public Carta[] getBaraja()
      Returns the deck of cards (mazo) as a 1D array.
      Returns:
      An array of Carta objects representing the deck of cards.

      Returns a string representation of the deck of cards (mazo).
